courseName: Healthcare Practice (Simulation Pathway) - MSc, PgDip, PgCert
facultyName: Faculty of Medicine, Health and Social Care
description: This course will develop your professional practice, both as an educator and, in deeper understanding of the practical applications of your learning translated into the workplace, to provide high quality care and professional development to enhance the experience and outcomes of service users.Based within the Institute of Medical Sciences, a centre of excellence for postgraduate medical education and research, you will have access to cutting-edge simulation facilities to aid your learning and development.
duration: 1 year full time, 2 years part time
fees: FeesUK Part time - £915 per 20 credit module  Overseas Part time - £1,610 per 20 credit module
